about_the_game:
Master of the Earth Reborn is large adult fantasy game loosely based on the Avatar, Harry Potter and Supernatural series.

The game is a story-driven 3d visual novel where you play as a boy with magical powers who was locked away for nine years.



Nine years ago at the age of fourteen you unlocked a strange magical ability that allowed you to do as you like. Giving a young man powers such as that is simply a recipe for disaster. Your powers led you to accidentally kill an innocent woman. The town's witches banded together to capture and trap you within a magical house far away from civilization.

After nine years of studying magic every day you finally master your magic and break free from the magical shackles.

Now it is time for you to get your revenge.

Welcome to Carta Town:


  • Explore various locations
  • Meet and romance many characters
  • Enjoy smooth animations
  • High quality renders
  • Simple UI and Interface



The game is an adult RPG visual novel with contains sexual and 18+ scenes.
Here is some of what you may come across in the game.

  • Oral Sex
  • Vaginal sex
  • Anal sex
  • Magical Sex
  • Sex with magical creatures
  • Mind Control
  • BDSM
  • Fetish



Join a magic school of your choosing and proceed forward into the dangerous world.

Schools of Magic



This game features a unique magic system with several spells to help you in your conquest.
Jump into a magical world full of trickery and adventures!​


Join a magic school of your choosing and proceed forward into the dangerous world.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains consensual sex, slave training aspects, implied violence. 

The game also contains non-consensual sexual content which may be uncomfortable for certain players.

Please, note that all characters in the game are 18 age or older.

All sexual acts in the game are consensual.

short_description: Master of the Earth: Chapter 1 is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel about a magic and sorcery. Play as a young guy who has been locked inside an enchanted prison for the last nine years. Now it is time for revenge!
